rca_result.root_cause: Multiple infrastructure vulnerabilities detected: Auto Scaling launch template misconfiguration preventing instance launches, VPN redundancy loss creating network connectivity risks, and high-risk Kafka configuration with replication factor of 1
evidence: AWS_EC2_AUTOSCALING_LAUNCH_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND health event indicates missing or deleted launch template
Multiple AWS_VPN_REDUNDANCY_LOSS events showing loss of VPN tunnel redundancy
AWS_KAFKA_HIGH_RISK_CONFIG_RF_EQUALS_ONE indicates Kafka replication factor set to 1
Pattern matches historical Reference Pattern 2 with 0.63 score
Multiple open health events across critical infrastructure services

remediation.suggestion: Address critical infrastructure misconfigurations to prevent service disruptions
checklist: Verify and recreate missing Auto Scaling launch template with correct configuration
Check VPN tunnel status and restore redundancy by bringing up secondary tunnels
Increase Kafka replication factor from 1 to at least 3 for production workloads
Review Lambda lifecycle events and plan for upcoming changes
Monitor Kinesis Analytics Flink maintenance window impact
